The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Welcome back to Reception for Term Two! We hope that all of our Reception families had a fantastic holiday. We would also like to welcome our new families to ISM.
Over the course of this term we will cover four topics; ‘Space (replacing Dinosaurs), ‘Plants & Life cycles’, ‘Toys’ and ‘High in the Sky’. Please click here to download the Reception curriculum overview.
Spring Term Dates (12 weeks/ 60 days)
Monday 13th January – First day back
Tuesday 28th and Wednesday 29th January – ASAs begin
Monday 17th February – Friday 21st February – International week
Friday 21st February – Mid Year Reports
Monday 24th - Friday 28th February – Half term (return Monday 3rd March)
Tuesday 4th and Wednesday 5th March – Parent-teacher Consultations 4-6pm
Wednesday 5th March - World Maths Day
Tuesday 18th and Wednesday 19th March – Last days of ASAs
Friday 11th April – Last day of term – Noon finish
We would like to thank you for your time and effort in supporting the children in all areas of their learning. We look forward to working with you and your children this term.
Yours Sincerely,
The Reception Teaching Team
The International School of Moscow
World Class Education
